zh-CN.title: 灾厄大修Wiki
zh-CN.description:
这是一个为灾厄大修玩家和开发者提供的资料库，您可以在这里查询关于模组内容的各种信息

(--当前维基并未制作完成,完成进度约35%,如果发现错误之处或者未完成的页面请见谅--)
zh-CN.weapons_desc: 查看所有新增和改动的武器
zh-CN.changes_desc: 查看关于特殊机制的内容
zh-CN.enemies_desc: 查看模组中新增和调整的生物
zh-CN.footer:
本Wiki的内容由灾厄大修开发组与社区贡献者们整理制作，并依据 CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 国际许可协议 进行许可。

BY(署名): 您必须提供适当的署名，指明原始来源，并标明是否对原始作品进行了修改。署名方式应合理且不得暗示本Wiki对您或您的使用行为进行背书。

NC(非商业性使用): 您不得将本Wiki的内容用于任何商业目的，包括但不限于开发第三方小程序或应用。灾厄大修开发组对商业用途的定义拥有最终解释权。

SA(相同方式共享): 如果您对本Wiki的内容进行修改、转换或基于其创作新的作品，您必须使用相同的许可协议发布您的贡献内容。

未经授权，任何个人或第三方不得将本Wiki的内容复制、转存或引用至商业用途的程序或应用。如需授权，请联系管理团队。

en-US.title: Calamity Overhaul Wiki
en-US.welcome: Welcome to the Calamity Overhaul Wiki
en-US.description:
This is a knowledge base for Calamity Overhaul players and developers, where you can find various information about the mod's content.

(--This wiki is not yet fully completed, with an estimated completion progress of about 35%. Please forgive any errors or unfinished pages.--)
en-US.weapons_desc: Browse all new and modified weapons in the mod.
en-US.changes_desc: Learn about all adjustments and modifications to the vanilla content in the mod.
en-US.enemies_desc: Check out the new and adjusted enemies in the mod.
en-US.footer:
The content of this Wiki is compiled by the Calamity Overhaul development team and community contributors, and is licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 International License.

BY (Attribution): You must give appropriate credit, indicate the original source, and specify whether modifications were made. The attribution should be reasonable and should not imply endorsement by this Wiki.

NC (Non-Commercial): You may not use the content of this Wiki for any commercial purposes, including but not limited to the development of third-party applications or software. The Calamity Overhaul development team has the final interpretation of what constitutes commercial use.

SA (ShareAlike): If you modify, transform, or build upon the content of this Wiki, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original.

Without authorization, no individual or third party may copy, transfer, or reference the content of this Wiki for commercial applications or software. For authorization, please contact the management team.

© 2024 CalamityOverhaul Wiki. All rights reserved.
